mapper.insert: INSERT INTO order_tb ( user_id, order_number, total_pric e, ordered_at, address, detail_address, status ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{orderNumber}, #{totalPrice}, NOW(), #{address}, #{detailAddress}, 'READY' )

INSERT INTO order_detail_tb ( order_id, product_id, unit_price, quantity, set_id, selected_drink_id, selected_side_id ) VALUES
( #{orderId}, #{item.productId}, #{item.unitPrice}, #{item.quantity}, #{item.setId}, #{item.selectedDrinkId}, #{item.selectedSideId} )
mapper.select: SELECT od.order_detail_id, od.order_id, od.product_id, od.unit_price, od.quantity, od.set_id, od.selected_drink_id, od.selected_side_id, o.ordered_at, i.item_name, i.size AS itemSize, GROUP_CONCAT(ing.ingredient_name ORDER BY c.display_order SEPARATOR ', ') AS ingredientsText, sm.set_name, d.ingredient_name AS drinkName, s.ingredient_name AS sideName FROM order_detail_tb od INNER JOIN order_tb o ON od.order_id = o.order_id INNER JOIN product_item_tb pi ON od.product_id = pi.product_id INNER JOIN item_tb i ON pi.item_id = i.item_id LEFT JOIN product_ingredient_tb ping ON od.product_id = ping.product_id LEFT JOIN ingredient_tb ing ON ping.ingredient_id = ing.ingredient_id LEFT JOIN category_tb c ON ing.category_id = c.category_id LEFT JOIN set_menu_tb sm ON od.set_id = sm.set_id LEFT JOIN ingredient_tb d ON od.selected_drink_id = d.ingredient_id LEFT JOIN ingredient_tb s ON od.selected_side_id = s.ingredient_id WHERE o.user_id = #{userId} GROUP BY od.order_detail_id ORDER BY o.ordered_at DESC, od.order_detail_id
SELECT order_id, user_id, order_number, total_price, ordered_at, address, detail_address FROM order_tb WHERE order_id = #{orderId}

SELECT od.order_detail_id, od.order_id, od.product_id, od.unit_price, od.quantity, od.set_id, od.selected_drink_id, od.selected_side_id, i.item_name, i.size AS itemSize, GROUP_CONCAT(ing.ingredient_name ORDER BY c.display_order SEPARATOR ', ') AS ingredientsText, sm.set_name, d.ingredient_name AS drinkName, s.ingredient_name AS sideName FROM order_detail_tb od INNER JOIN product_item_tb pi ON od.product_id = pi.product_id INNER JOIN item_tb i ON pi.item_id = i.item_id LEFT JOIN product_ingredient_tb ping ON od.product_id = ping.product_id LEFT JOIN ingredient_tb ing ON ping.ingredient_id = ing.ingredient_id LEFT JOIN category_tb c ON ing.category_id = c.category_id LEFT JOIN set_menu_tb sm ON od.set_id = sm.set_id LEFT JOIN ingredient_tb d ON od.selected_drink_id = d.ingredient_id LEFT JOIN ingredient_tb s ON od.selected_side_id = s.ingredient_id WHERE od.order_id = #{orderId} GROUP BY od.order_detail_id ORDER BY od.order_detail_id
select total_price from order_tb where order_number = #{orderNumber}
